column4: Hi, dhclient keeps getting ridiculously short leases (200-1500 seconds). Any ideas why? I'm having the same problem at home and at university, so it's unlikely to be a router problem.
I have about 1300 seconds until my lease expires so please make it quick :p
this is a new issue, by the way. It started occuring about a week ago. I haven't made any major updates for the last two weeks so I'm not sure what could be the cause.
for comparison, I get 32903secs off my router...
